Q_DESC:
Create a class names TaxCalculator with the following private data members:

Int basicsalary
Int dapercentage
Int hrapercentage
Float taxAmount
Float takeHomeSalary

Include the following functions

initializeData() that accepts 3arguments and its return type is void. This function is used to set the values for basicsalary, dapercentage and hrapercentage. 

calculateTaxamount() 1 argument which corresponds to taxPercentage(int) is passed.

The default value for taxpercentage is 5%
calculate TakeHomeSalary()

displayData()
Refer class template under submission tab for more details on functions.
Write a main function to test the above class. 
Create 2 objects and invoke the various functions

Input:-
 All space seperated  Enter the basic salary ,Enter the DA percentage ,Enter the HRA percentage .

Output:-  
    1st line Basic Salary :
    2nd  line    DA :      
    3rd line  HRA :
    4th  line    Total :
    5th  line    Tax : 
    6th  line    Final Salary :
